Name: The Fabled Magnetic Cube Mechanics - III
Description: Mizhi has come to his senses. What exactly did he encounter in the abandoned mine, and did he manage to find the ultimate Mechanics he had been pursuing?
QuestDesc: Mizhi has come to his senses. What exactly did he encounter in the abandoned mine, and did he manage to find the ultimate Mechanics he had been pursuing?

Conditions.PreQuestName: The Fabled Magnetic Cube Mechanics - II

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well done. Seems like you can use some moreâ€¦

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The way you solved it... It amazed me still though I've watched this before.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh... more inspiration...

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Perfect, so perfect...

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The timeing, the steps. You made that exact and fitted. A textbook solving.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Right, why don't we just write that into a textbook? My Magnetic Cube Mechanics and your techniques.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Only now Magnetic Cube Mechanics reached the ultimate.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Only the Magnetic Cube Mechanics developed step by step by myself is so fulfilling.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, Mi'zhi is awake now, and he's looking for you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I don't know how I could repay you. You solved the puzzles with ID recorded for me, and you saved from the pit...

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ... And most importantly, you helped me find the ultimate Automatic Mechanics!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, you! Don't look around, it's just you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I went down the pit for the ultimate Magnetic Cube Mechanics, but I was just almost frozen to death.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The moment I entered it, the freezing air overwhelmed me, and a voice kept saying in my head that the ultimate Magnetic Cube Mechanics was just hidden in the cold and that I should touch the air.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And as soon as I touch the air, yowls started to crowd my mind... They sounded just like the hopeless wails human would make before dying.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I saw those engineers before me in a trance... They were struggling desperately... and finally consumed by the cold.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Looking back now, the voice calling me was maybe just a bait. Sigh... there wasn't any "ultimate Magnetic Cube Mechanics" down there.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But when I was there and caught up in the moment, I found my retreat blocked. The Ice Chrysalises swarmed the exit.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And when I lost conscious due to the frost, it was you, {PlayerName}, that crossed my mind.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I read that the near-death experience could stimulate human's most instinctive desire.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Cough. I've been desiring the ultimate Magnetic Cube Mechanics all the time... ... But when I think of it now, it is just by my side!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's you, {PlayerName}! Whenever I think of your marvellous techniques, inspirations about Magnetic Cube Mechanics will spring out in my head.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: May I see that techniques again?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, now. I can't keep lying whenever I think of those techniques.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingshu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't take this amiss, {PlayerName}. He's just the kind of person who couldn't even lie down and rest when there's something about Magnetic Cube Mechanics.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes. I just thought of a few new mechanic combinations when I was resting. They are meant for you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Only your puzzle-solving brings me the most inspirations.
